import React from 'react' import { useState, useEffect } from 'react' import './App.css' const App = () =>{ const [seconds, setSeconds] = useState(25*60) useEffect(()=>{ const countDown = setInterval(()=>{ if (seconds > 0){ setSeconds(seconds-1); } }, 1000) return () => clearInterval(countDown); }, [seconds]) const editTime = (time) =>{ return time < 10? `0${time}` : time } const minutes = Math.floor(seconds/60) const remainSeconds = seconds % 60 return ( <>
